009package Ch23_ImageMatching;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.WindowManager;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.image.matching.CorrCoeffMatcher;
019
020
021/** 
022 * Template matching plugin based on the local correlation coefficient.
023 * TODO: Slow because it uses getPixelValue() for pixel access.
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 */
027public class CorrelCoeff_Matching_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
028
029        private ImagePlus imgR = null;
030
031    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
032        return DOES_8G + DOES_32 + NO_CHANGES;
033    }
034    
035    //--------------------------------------------------------------------
036
037    public void run(ImageProcessor ipI) {
038                if (!showDialog() || imgR == null) {
039                        return;
040                }
041                
042        FloatProcessor I = (FloatProcessor) ipI.convertToFloatProcessor();      // search image
043                CorrCoeffMatcher matcher = new CorrCoeffMatcher(I);
044                
045                ImageProcessor ipR = imgR.getProcessor();
046                FloatProcessor R = (FloatProcessor) ipR.convertToFloatProcessor();      // reference image
047                
048                float[][] C = matcher.getMatch(R);
049                FloatProcessor Cp = new FloatProcessor(C);
050                (new ImagePlus("Correlation Coefficient", Cp)).show();
051    }
052 
053    //--------------------------------------------------------------------
054
055    private boolean showDialog() {
056                int[] wList = WindowManager.getIDList();
057                if (wList==null) {
058                        IJ.error("No windows are open.");
059                        return false;
060                }
061
062                String[] titles = new String[wList.length];
063                for (int i = 0; i < wList.length; i++) {
064                        ImagePlus imp = WindowManager.getImage(wList[i]);
065                        if (imp!=null)
066                                titles[i] = imp.getTitle();
067                        else
068                                titles[i] = "";
069                }
070                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Select Reference Image");
071                String title2;
072                if (imgR == null)
073                        title2 = titles[0];
074                else
075                        title2 = imgR.getTitle();
076                gd.addChoice("Template:", titles, title2);
077                gd.showDialog();
078                if (gd.wasCanceled())
079                        return false;
080                else {
081                        int index2 = gd.getNextChoiceIndex();
082                        title2 = titles[index2];
083                        imgR = WindowManager.getImage(wList[index2]);
084                        return true;
085                }
086    }
087}
088
